text.en_US: Professional Service Group (PSG) of StayinFront is in charge of designing, developing and maintaining bespoke CRM system for each custormer. As a developer, my job is to build and support systems that is based on StayinFront's core CRM engine. I also need to integrate our core engine with third party software or API to suit custormer's needs. As a result, I had the chance to participate in the development of various technology / programming languages, such as VBScript, VB.Net, C#.Net, MS SQL, SSIS, ReactJS, OfficeJS, etc.
This is my first IT Job, and I am really greateful that StayinFront is kind enought to give me the chance.
Wash dishes and help preparing foods in kitchen.

This is theoratically the my first job. Before that I was working in some factory based on my mother's relationship with others, or only few days in some Chinese Restraout. But this job, is found by myself, along. And it last for more than 1 year.
成绩比起华丽的形容词更具有说服力。

Excellent in Calculus
Merit in Physics and Design and Visual Communication
一个记账软件，通过账单分类让使用者对自己的消费有明晰的认知。支持多汇率。
Turandot is a pure Python application that allows you to create and open encrypted files.

Professional Service Group (PSG) of StayinFront is in charge of designing, developing and maintaining bespoke CRM system for each custormer. As a developer, my job is to build and support systems that is based on StayinFront's core CRM engine. I also need to integrate our core engine with third party software or API to suit custormer's needs. As a result, I had the chance to participate in the development of various technology / programming languages, such as VBScript, VB.Net, C#.Net, MS SQL, SSIS, ReactJS, OfficeJS, etc.
